LeiLie
May 11, 2018

Introducing Rain

Rain is a simple and clean Jekyll theme with focus on content. This theme is heavily inspired by Tale theme.

Rain features

  • Compatible with GitHub Pages
  • Compatible with Netlify
  • Responsive design
  • Syntax highlighting, with the help of Pygments
  • Markdown and HTML text formatting
  • Pagination of posts
  • Social media links with icons
  • Related posts

Browser Support

Rain works on most if not all modern browsers, including Chrome, Safari and Firefox

Download or Contribute

Rain is publicly hosted on GitHub, so go ahead and download or fork it at the GitHub repository.
